name: DiceHead (titolovesyou)
description:
The chess pieces have begun their crusade to rid the world of Randomness in games! Will you, DiceHead, stop them before it's too late? 

WASD to move, M1 to shoot, M2 to roll!

P.S. the game only has 4 levels, and they're mostly just little arenas to play with the mechanics in.
